chara.textHome:
I'm Meiyui Chun, a member
of the Blue Seas Family.

I'll allow no one to get away with
injuring any of my friends.
Indeed, I will strike down all who try.
So, I must become more powerful...

I must work my hardest today,
and every day.
My training never ends.

No matter how strong I grow,
there is one enemy I fear I cannot defeat.
Of course, it's...almond pudding!

I am laid low by its
deliciousness every time...

I always discover a new
technique when I train!

Now I have a faint sense for how the
Blue Seas Family should move forward...

The Blue Seas Family has straightened
out its act, but I still feel cold glares
from outsiders.

That's why I'll probably end up
making it into a company someday.

The Blue Seas Family will make
a commitment to Kamihama City

to become one of their leading
companies in the venture market.

We will innovate, synergize, coordinate...
things like that?

Do you think if I talk like that
we'll be able to make money?
You're here! I was waiting for you.
Let's carry on with our training.
First, the squirrel monkey pose...
Huh? Not here for training?
Sorry about that.

In the mornings, breathe deeply
to fill your body with fresh air.
It's something I do every day.
We'll do it together, okay?
Breathe in, breathe out...

Today's lunch is mapo tofu,
dumplings, and fried rice.

If I'm really hungry, sometimes I
also eat pork and chicken.

I always go to the shopping district
to check up on everyone on my way
home from school.
Sometimes I get tea too.

Pu'er tea is very good for the body,
you know?

This time of day is good for
thinking up strategies.

It's like what Master always says...
Training never stops.
You have to keep practicing every single day.
Hiiiyah!

I might look like I'm not doing anything,
but I'm actually training.

Hehehe... I'm practicing standing
on my tiptoes right now!

Everything I do is for the Blue Seas Gang...
That is why I trained so hard...
No battle scares me!

I don't care when or where
an enemy attacks.
I will always stand and fight.
It doesn't matter where they come from.
I look forward to my next battle.

It would be best if we didn't need to
fight and everyone could live in peace.

But there are those who want 
to destroy that peace.
That much is certain.
Tianjin rice is actually not Chinese food.

It's a Chinese style of food
originating in Japan.
We do have egg foo young, though...
That's a Chinese omelet.
I love my stuffed animals.
They're so cute and soft...

When I was younger, they were
good partners for my training.
What?

Th-that's the legendary stance that can
kill a person without even touching them!
How did you, of all people—
Oh, I'm sorry. It seems I was mistaken.

The Blue Seas Gang would never
go after someone weak.

We only target people who
are doing bad things.
That is a very important rule for us.

I don't regret the wish I made
when I became a Magical Girl.

I'm just glad I was able to save the 
Blue Seas Gang in their time of need.
My father is also in the Blue Seas Gang.
They say he was strong long ago.

He could take down five enemies
using only his spirit.
I know it's true because he told me himself.
It is true that Nanaka Tokiwa is very skilled.

She has a sweet face, but there is a tiger
sleeping in her heart.
She is dangerous.

I will teach you a famous
kempo master's saying.
He said, "Don't think, feeeeeel."
You must always remember this saying.
Come at me whenever you please.
No problem.
That was an easy victory.
My fists did the winning.
I will protect the Blue Sea Family.

I am here now, so there is
no need to be upset.
I will not allow anyone to harm you...
But, can I have some tea first?
My Kung Fu has improved.
I've definitely gotten stronger.

I can sense, without a shadow of a doubt...
my kung fu is at its peak!

I feel I have taken another
step on my journey.
I can still go even further too!
Chi flows through all things.

Take it in, feel it circulate within yourself,
then let it out again.
This is the first thing you learn in our style.
It is the basis of everything.

Water can extinguish fire,
but fails to part earth...
This is something my master taught me.

All things have their
strengths and weaknesses.
It is important to perceive them.
